https://tmrev.io/movie/739344-Artur Rubinstein: The Legendary Moscow Recital 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nnIlH2lZ8tvmVRHOAk2TLcu1FXH.jpg Arthur Rubinstein's 1964 recital in the Great Hall of the Moscow Conservatory, filmed and recorded by Soviet television and preserved in its archives, in a program of work of Chopin and — in encores introduced from the stage by Rubinstein — Schumann, Chopin, Debussy, and Villa-Lobos. Artur Rubinstein: The Legendary Moscow Recital
